segments.text: Judging by all the traffic , I'd say we're near the outskirts of the city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did I do wrong ? Did I take a wrong turn ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure , but I think you turned right when you should have turned left on the flyover bridge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , now we should turn back a few kilometres .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seems that the traffic sign is much more important than the map .
segments.speaker: S2
